CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...9. The artistic Adair California Wine booth was graced beautifully by Miss Margaret Amaker...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Adair California Wine booth with six bottles on pillars, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
